name: SUPER PERRIER: Monster Evolution
description:
SUPER PERRIER: MONSTER EVOLUTION

This is our submission to the Roguelike Game Jam 3 !

SuperPerrierNosterEvolution is a Roguelite where you control a monster and have to destroy the city!

How to play

Move: Arrow Keys

Attack: Spacebar

Dash: Left-Shift

Destroy the buildings to gain gold, use the gold to purchase permanent upgrades ! Destoy the enemies to gain XP.

NOTE
You can normally play this game in the browser, but the game might be a little bit buggy. To play the stable game, you can download the .exe file.
